name: Fezandipiti
flavorText: Fezandipiti owes its beautiful looks and lovely voice to the toxic stimulants emanating from the chain wrapped around its body.

previous.name: Munkidori
previous.flavorText: The chain is made from toxins that enhance capabilities. It stimulated Munkidori's brain and caused the Pokémon's psychic powers to bloom.

next.name: Ogerpon
next.flavorText: This Pokémon's type changes based on which mask it's wearing. It confounds its enemies with nimble movements and kicks.

pokemon.name: Fezandipiti
pokemon.flavorText: Fezandipiti owes its beautiful looks and lovely voice to the toxic stimulants emanating from the chain wrapped around its body.
